name: Caliban
relicBonuses: After the bearer {ACTION_attacks} or is {ACTION_attacked}, it afflicts the enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_STONE}.
After the bearer {ACTION_attacks}, this relic {ACTION_attacks} the enemy as well.
After the bearer takes damage while it is {ACTION_defending} or {ACTION_provoking}, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1976]Petrify on the enemy.
After an enemy is afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_STONE}, the bearer gains 15% Maximum {STAT_health}.
This relic and its bearer deal 100% more damage to enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_STONE}.
After the bearer {ACTION_defends} or {ACTION_provokes}, this relic {ACTION_attacks} a random enemy.
The bearer takes 50% less damage from enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_STONE}.
After this relic {ACTION_attacks} an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_STONE}, it has a 10% chance to kill it.
After the bearer is killed, this relic afflicts enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_STONE}.
title: God of Dreams
